title: Spicy Mango Salsa
ingredients: ['4 medium mangos - peeled, stones removed and cubed', '4 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '2 tablespoons chopped shallots', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
